additionalDescription: Data taken from Xeno-Canto. Needs a kaggle account to download the data. Vocalisation type also annotated. Part of the BEANS benchmark
description: In this competition, you will identify a wide variety of bird vocalizations in soundscape recordings. Due to the complexity of the recordings, they contain weak labels. There might be anthropogenic sounds (e.g., airplane overflights) or other bird and non-bird (e.g., chipmunk) calls in the background, with a particular labeled bird species in the foreground.
name: Cornell Bird Identification (CBI)
title: Cornell Birdcall Identification
